segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen flood is disgusting, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing like a broken pipe, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman's just drying a plate, her apron getting splattered.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle on the floor, filthy and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids climbing for cookies, adding to the disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool in the wet spot, gross if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand in the jar, crumbs probably falling into the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching up, oblivious to the nasty water nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets dripping, what a waste and eyesore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked, could get ruined in this slop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's garden looks clean, unlike this pigsty inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this unclean disaster unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
